and sharing courses

Launching early 2014

Create a custom company structure

Old way

Tracking employee courses in a large company structure can be impossible with any other out of the-box solution.

Coursetto way

Create your company organization tree anyway you like and place managers to create micro taining envirnments

Graphs!

Track all your lower tiers. Set mangers to higher tier and deligate training.

Content Creation

Anyone can create courses

Allow anyone in your company to create and manage courses making custom content a breeze on desktop or mobile.

You can always restrict anyones access to disble creating, puchasing and managing of users.

Content Creation Subscription Pricing

Course Marketplace

No subscription neccessary

No time to build a course and just need something standard such as a sexual harrassement course? Then head over to the course marketplace.

Course Distribution

Your company structure is on the right. Watch your price flucutate as you turn off departments that dont need to take the course. The price is just an estimate of credits needed to be purchesed. Credits are only used when a user actually takes a course. Users get an unlimted amount of times to take a course. Once purchesed the course will appear for any "on" departments.
